Package br.uff.tempo.middleware.management.interfaces

Interface Summary
IActuator This interface contains Actuator methods

Actuator is an element that execute actions corresponding to context rules
IAggregator This interface contains Aggregator methods

Aggregator contains aggregation methods that add Context Variables to Interpreters of context rules
IInterpreter This interface contains Interpreter methods

Interpreter contains methods that set and execute context rules
IPerson This interface contains Person Agent methods

Person agent type contains methods that manage mobility and aggregate body sensors
IPlace This interface contains Place Agent methods

This element contains methods that indicates access by agents in Place
IResourceAgent This interface contains ResourceAgent Agent methods

ResourceAgent represents smart modules that comprehends communications and contextual functionalities
IResourceDiscovery Resource Discovery Service (RDS) interface

It enables use of RDS in SmartServer
IResourceLocation Resource Location Service (RLS) interface

It enables use of RLS in SmartServer
IResourceRegister Resource Register Service (RRS) interface

It enables use of RRS in SmartServer
IRuleInterpreter Rule interpreter interface

Rule Interpreter manages context rules
 

Enum Summary
IResourceAgent.CVType Enumerator of Context Variable types
IResourceAgent.SType Serialize Type
 

Annotation Types Summary
IResourceAgent.ContextVariable  
IResourceAgent.Service
